remarks: Universal property of the free monoid by existential uniqueness. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
statement:
frmdup3.m $e |- M = ( freeMnd ` I ) $.
frmdup3.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
frmdup3.u $e |- U = ( varFMnd ` I ) $.
frmdup3 $p |- ( ( G e. Mnd /\ I e. V /\ A : I --> B ) -> E! m e. ( M MndHom G ) ( m o. U ) = A ) $.
$d A m $.
$d B m $.
$d G m $.
$d I m $.
$d M m $.
$d U m $.
$d V m $.
